International Business.1: Demonstrate an advanced knowledge of the five functional areas of business (Accounting, Economics, Finance, Management, Marketing).
International Business.2: Locate and manipulate data to inform business decisions.
International Business.3: Integrate the knowledge from multiple areas in making business decisions.
International Business.4: Identify stakeholders and consider their perspectives in an ethical fashion.
International Business.5: Have an awareness of the adaptations necessary in functional Business areas while doing business globally.
International Business.6: Have a cultural awareness of at least one international location through an Education Abroad experience.
International Business.7: Recognize the variations in logical constructs arising from cultural differences.
